import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Button, Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Card } from "react-bootstrap"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import Message from "../components/Message"; import CheckoutSteps from "../components/CheckoutSteps"; const PlaceOrderScreen = () => { const cart = useSelector((state) => state.cart); cart.itemsPrice = cart.cartItems.reduce((acc, item)) const placeOrderHandler = () => {}; return ( <>

Envío

Dirección: {cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city},{" "} {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode},{" "} {cart.shippingAddress.country}

Método de Pago

Método: {cart.paymentMethod}

Productos

{cart.cartItems.length === 0 ? ( Tu carrito está vacío ) : ( {cart.cartItems.map((item, index) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} x ${item.price} = $ {(item.qty * item.price).toFixed(2)} ))} )}

Final

 Productos ${cart.itemsPrice} Envío ${cart.shippingPrice} Total ${cart.totalPrice} ); }; export default PlaceOrderScreen;
